paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In one family, different ATTR fibril types was found in two brothers with similar ages at onset.
In one family, different ATTR fibril types was found in two brothers with similar ages at onset.

functional_data.summary: Type A fibrils contain transthyretin fragments. Type B fibrils contain only full-length transthyretin.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, as shown by the consistency of amyloid fibril composition.
variants.additional_notes: The study suggests that genetic factors play a role in amyloid fibril composition.
key_quotes: The consistency of amyloid fibril composition type within 14 of 15 investigated families suggests that genetic/epigenetic factors exert an impact on amyloid fibril composition.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of families and their amyloid fibril composition type

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
